mozilla.components.service.fretboard

Interface ExperimentSource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KintoExperimentSource

    public ExperimentSource

    Represents a location where experiments are stored (Kinto, a JSON file on a server, etc)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ExperimentsSnapshot getExperiments(ExperimentsSnapshot snapshot)
      Requests new experiments from the source, parsing the response into experiments

    • Method Detail

      • getExperiments

        ExperimentsSnapshot getExperiments(ExperimentsSnapshot snapshot)

        Requests new experiments from the source, parsing the response into experiments

        Parameters:
        snapshot - list of already downloaded experiments (in order to process a diff response, for example)
        Returns:
        modified list of experiments
